segments.text: Stephany said she would go out with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought mom said no dating till you are 16 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s in one month , and besides , this is a group date with all of our friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All of your friends , what are you planning to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What a party ! I hope you don ’ t expect the girls to fish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These girls are different , they are not wimpy .
segments.speaker: S2
